ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <5> 55mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter + <6> PD-C10 Camera / Camcorder Case +
<7> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> LCD Screen Protectors + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> Image Recovery Software
